Attackdex

Type: Fairy

Voyager New Moves
Voyager Updated Moves
Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Alluring Voice 10 80 100 Causes confusion if the target's stats were raised during the turn.
Aromatic Mist 20 — — The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.
Baby-Doll Eyes 30 — 100 The user's baby-doll eyes the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.
Charm 20 — 100 The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, harshly lowering its Attack stat.
Crafty Shield 10 — — The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power.
Dazzling Gleam 10 80 100 The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.
Decorate 15 — — The user sharply raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.
Disarming Voice 15 40 — The user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon with a charming cry that never misses.
Dizzy Punch 10 70 100 The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches and may be left confused.
Draining Kiss 10 50 100 The user steals the target's HP with a kiss, restoring its HP by over half of the damage dealt.
Fairy Lock 10 — — By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing next turn.
Fairy Wind 30 40 100 The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.
Fever Dream 10 80 100 A dream shared between the user and the foe. It deals more damage if either is asleep.
Fleur Cannon 5 130 90 The user unleashes a strong beam. The recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.
Floral Healing 10 — — The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP on grass.
Flower Shield 10 — — The user raises the Defense stats of all Grass-type Pokémon with a mysterious power.
Geomancy 10 — — The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its special and Speed stats on the next turn.
Light of Ruin 5 140 90 The user fires a beam of light powered by the Eternal Flower, but is damaged quite a lot.
Magical Torque 10 100 100 A mystical spinning attack that may confuse the foe.
Misty Explosion 5 150 100 The user attacks everything around it and faints. This move is stronger on Misty Terrain.
Misty Terrain 10 — — For 5 turns, grounded Pokémon's status is protected and Dragon-type moves are weaker.
Moonblast 15 95 100 The user attacks the target with the power of the moon. This may also lower its Sp. Atk stat.
Moonlight 5 — — The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
Nature's Madness 10 — 90 The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target's HP.
Play Rough 10 90 90 The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower its Attack stat.
Rough n' Tumble 10 15 85 The target is jabbed repeatedly, taking up to two to five hits in a row.
Silly Slash 15 70 100 The user slashes the target in an effervescent manner. Critical hits land more easily.
Sparkly Swirl 5 120 85 A whirlwind of scent attacks the target and cures the user's party's status conditions.
Spirit Break 15 75 100 The target is hit with a force that can break its spirit. It also lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
Spirit Sever 10 85 95 The user siphons the target's spirit, restoring its HP by half of the damage caused.
Springtide Storm 5 100 80 The user wraps the foe in fierce winds. It may lower the target's Attack.
Sprite Smash 10 130 90 The user launches a pixelated slam. The recoil harshly lowers the user's Attack stat.
Strange Steam 10 90 95 The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.
Sweet Kiss 10 — 75 The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.
